person.persName: Robert N. Ferguson (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, soldier.)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, soldier. Illinois native. Son of John Ferguson and Harriett Kirtley Ferguson. Stepson of D. P. Betherum. Resident of Rockcastle County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Rockcastle County in 1860. Served in the Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards (U.S.A.) as a corporal from May 7, 1862, to July 7, 1862.
